SELECT case when pass_flag=1 or (pass_flag = 10 and (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now())*1000 - start_time)/1000 > 1900) then '放弃考试：' else (case when pass_flag=5 then '完成考试：' else '正在考试：' end ) end tongji,count(*) num FROM t_chc_answer_result WHERE exam_id = 2002 GROUP BY tongji

SELECT case when LENGTH(province_name)=0 then '未知' else province_name end sheng, case when pass_flag=1 or (pass_flag = 10 and (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now())*1000 - start_time)/1000 > 1900) then '放弃考试：' else (case when pass_flag=5 then '完成考试：' else '正在考试：' end ) end tongji, count(*) num FROM (SELECT t.*,province_name FROM t_chc_answer_result t left join p_doctor d on t.doctor_id = d.id WHERE exam_id = 2002) a group by province_name,tongji order by province_name

SELECT case when LENGTH(province_name)=0 then '未知' else province_name end sheng,count(1) num FROM t_chc_answer_result t left join p_doctor d on t.doctor_id = d.id WHERE exam_id = 2002 GROUP BY province_name ORDER BY count(1) desc;
